Uses of Interface
com.yworks.yfiles.layout.hierarchic.ILayerConstraint

  • Packages that use ILayerConstraint 
    Package Description
    com.yworks.yfiles.layout.hierarchic
    Provides hierarchic layout style algorithms.

    • Uses of ILayerConstraint in com.yworks.yfiles.layout.hierarchic

      Methods in com.yworks.yfiles.layout.hierarchic that return ILayerConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeAboveConstraint(Object referenceId, Object aboveId)
      Adds a constraint that forces the Node with ID aboveId to lie above the Node with ID referenceId.
      default ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeAboveConstraint(Object referenceId, Object aboveId, int minDistance)
      Adds a constraint that forces the Node with ID aboveId to lie at least minDistance layers above the Node with ID referenceId with a given weight penalty for larger layer differences.
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeAboveConstraint(Object referenceId, Object aboveId, int minDistance, int weight)
      Adds a constraint that forces the Node with ID aboveId to lie at least minDistance layers above the Node with ID referenceId with a given weight penalty for larger layer differences.
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeAtBottomConstraint(Object nodeId)
      Adds a constraint that places a Node on the bottom layer.
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeAtTopConstraint(Object nodeId)
      Adds a constraint that places a Node on the topmost layer.
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeBelowConstraint(Object referenceId, Object belowId)
      Adds a constraint that forces a Node with ID belowId to lie below the Node with ID referenceId.
      default ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeBelowConstraint(Object referenceId, Object belowId, int minDistance)
      Adds a constraint that forces the Node with ID belowId to lie at least minDistance layers below the Node with ID referenceId with a given weight penalty for larger layer differences.
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeBelowConstraint(Object referenceId, Object belowId, int minDistance, int weight)
      Adds a constraint that forces the Node with ID belowId to lie at least minDistance layers below the Node with ID referenceId with a given weight penalty for larger layer differences.
      ILayerConstraint ILayerConstraintFactory.addPlaceNodeInSameLayerConstraint(Object referenceId, Object sameLayerId)
      Adds a constraint that forces the Node with ID sameLayerId to lie in the same layer as the Node with ID referenceId.
